title: 23.10.2 Release
body:
- [x] Confirm anything outstanding for release with other maintainers on #besu-release
- [x] Update main gradle.properties to 23.10.3-SNAPSHOT and create new changelog section - https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/pull/6154 
- [x] Notify maintainers about updating changelog for in-flight PRs 
- [x] Cherry-pick commits since 23.10.2 onto release-23.10.2 branch
- [x] Start burn-in of 23.10.2-RC
- [x] Sign off burn-in monitoring
- [ ] Bump 23.10.2-RC to 23.10.2 on release branch (not main!)
- [ ] Docker release startup test:
    - `docker run hyperledger/besu:23.10.2`
    - `docker run hyperledger/besu:23.10.2-arm64`
    - `docker run hyperledger/besu:23.10.2-openjdk-17`
    - `docker run hyperledger/besu:23.10.2-openjdk-latest`
    - `docker run --platform linux/amd64 hyperledger/besu:23.10.2-amd64`
- [ ] Draft release notes
- [ ] Draft homebrew PR
- [ ] Draft documentation release
- [ ] Sign-off with team
- [ ] Publish release (which triggers docker latest tag)
- [ ] Docker `latest` release startup test 
  - `docker run --pull=always hyperledger/besu:latest`
- [ ] Merge homebrew PR
- [ ] Publish Docs Release
- [ ] Social announcements
